DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the long-term effects of high-intensity progressive resistance training could improve glucose and lipid metabolism in chinese type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: The Impact of Resistance Training on Type 2 Diabetes Patients.
DOC.criteria: established type 2 diabetes severe joint cardiovascular and respiratory system disease, uncontrolled hypertension (160/90 mmHg), severe diabetic nephropathy and neuropathy with severe liver and kidney dysfunction with mental system disease pregnant women or nursing mothers
